mapper.sql: ID, CUSTOMER_ID, CUSTOMER_NAME, MONEY, ACCEPT_MONEY, REMARK, CREATE_NAME, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_NAME, MODIFY_DATE, DELETE_FLAG, REV1, REV2, REV3, CONTRACT_NAME, CONTRACT_NO, SIGN_DATE
mapper.select:
select
, (select c.NAME from CUSTOMER_INFO c where c.ID = CUSTOMER_ID) customerName from FINANCIAL_SALES_CONTRACT where 1 = 1 and DELETE_FLAG='0'
and CONTRACTNO like '%${contractNo}%'
and CONTRACTNAME like '%${ContractName}%'
order by CREATE_DATE desc
mapper.insert: insert into FINANCIAL_SALES_CONTRACT (ID, CUSTOMER_ID, CUSTOMER_NAME, MONEY, ACCEPT_MONEY, REMARK, CREATE_NAME, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_NAME, MODIFY_DATE, DELETE_FLAG, REV1, REV2, REV3, CONTRACT_NAME, CONTRACT_NO, SIGN_DATE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{acceptMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{modifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rev1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rev2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rev3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signDate,jdbcType=DATE})

mapper.update:
update FINANCIAL_SALES_CONTRACT
CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMER_NAME = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MONEY = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACCEPT_MONEY = #{acceptMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_NAME = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MODIFY_NAME = #{modifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=DATE},

REV1 = #{rev1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REV2 = #{rev2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REV3 = #{rev3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTRACT_NAME = #{contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIGN_DATE = #{signDate,jdbcType=DATE},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update FINANCIAL_SALES_CONTRACT set CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_NAME = #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONEY = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ACCEPT_MONEY = #{acceptMoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_NAME = #{createName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, MODIFY_NAME = #{modifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=DATE}, DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REV1 = #{rev1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REV2 = #{rev2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REV3 = #{rev3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTRACT_NAME = #{contractName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGN_DATE = #{signDate,jdbcType=DATE} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
